archimate:Requirement.name: ensure that Security Monitoring service have a clearly designated owne
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As the TEMA Business Owner I need to ensure that Security Monitoring service have a clearly designated owner who is responsible for: * Deploying the component in a safe manner (design, hardening) * The ongoing use of the component (security monitoring) * Keeping the component supported (not reaching end-of-life) * The timely deployment of security patches when they become available, including the verification that the patches * Having an apparatus ready to implement mitigating controls should a zero-day vulnerability arise This to ensure that the service is maintained, updated and operated according to the security baseline and best practices.
